basicInfo.name: Heavenia
basicInfo.flavor: On land, Heavenia joined the Evan Expedition and traveled around, eventually reuniting with her sister. She's become more powerful under her sister's guidance.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Chance: Freeze chance becomes 50%.

Skill 1.name: Sword of Judgment
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Chance: Freeze chance becomes 85%.

Skill 2.name: Mighty Sword
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 285% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 340% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Buff Duration Reduction becomes 3 turn(s).

Passive.name: Mana Cycling
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Attack Boost to 31%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Hellenia, Rudy, cookies, cheese, spicy things, justice, order, kindness, curiosity, extreme sports
profile.dislikes: Ariel, all kinds of milk, evil, chaos, cleaning, laundry
profile.story: As Hellenia's younger sister, Heavenia drew attention when she joined the Valkyries. However, her slow progress causes her sister constant worry.

basicInfo.name: Heavenia
basicInfo.flavor: Heavenia's fierce swordsmanship strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. She was ambushed as she left for a special mission on the ground.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]

 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]

 - Increases Damage: To 255% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
